lines.text: Ahhh. This'd be Mrs. Pedals, eh?
Mrs. Weebles.
No banter, Daniels.
Well, cheer up. Youth and beauty have arrived and brilliant wit. The old house will re-echo to music and laughter.
[Rick and Cole exit]

[tutting after them in disgust]
Show people!
Best laid plans of mice and men sometimes, uh, go a little bit haywire, huh?
Oh, it does not matter. We have lived through so much; we will overcome this. I live with you in jail, in hovels. I even live with you in pork pies.

[laughs]
It's pig sties, honey.
Oh, what's the difference?
Drink is the root of all evil.
Daniels, don't stare that way! You look like a vulture!
You can't quarrel with a lapdog.

[serving a barbecued sausage]
The root of evil.
You said it. Lots of evil has come out of the sea - the whirl for instance.
Liquor is the root; crime the stem and branches.

[disrespectfully]
And what's the fruit?
Jimmy's just gotten murdered. I just got it over the telephone.
What? Where? Where call come from?
Uh, uh, 126 Malibu Drive. There's a whole lot of girls there and say they just got murdered.
Suicides do not garrote themselves by trying granny knot at back of neck.
How do you expect to get co-orperation from one you so obviously and wrongly accuse?
She may have overheard something of importance, but I will question her later.
